verses.verse: For every <S%G3956><s%> high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> taken <S%G2983><s%> from among <S%G1537><s%> men <S%G444><s%> is appointed <S%G2525><s%> on behalf <S%G5228><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> in things pertaining <S%G4314><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> to offer <S%G4374><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> and sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> for sins; <S%G266><s%>

he can <S%G1410><s%> deal <S%G3356><s%> gently <S%G3356><s%> with the ignorant <S%G50><s%> and misguided, <S%G4105><s%> since <S%G1893><s%> he himself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is beset <S%G4029><s%> with weakness; <S%G769><s%>

and because <S%G1223><s%> of it he is obligated <S%G3784><s%> to offer <S%G4374><s%> [sacrifices] for sins, <S%G266><s%> as for the people, <S%G2992><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> for himself. <S%G1438><s%>

And no <S%G3756><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> takes <S%G2983><s%> the honor <S%G5092><s%> to himself, <S%G1438><s%> but [receives it] when he is called <S%G2564><s%> by God, <S%G2316><s%> even <S%G7101><s%> as Aaron was.

So <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> did not glorify <S%G1392><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> so as to become <S%G1096><s%> a high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> but He who <S%G5101><s%> said <S%G2980><s%> to Him, "Thou art <S%G1510><s%> My Son, <S%G5207><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> I have begotten <S%G1080><s%> Thee";

just <S%G2531><s%> as He says <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in another <S%G2087><s%> [passage], "Thou art a priest <S%G2409><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> According <S%G2596><s%> to the order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchizedek. <S%G3198><s%>"

In the days <S%G2250><s%> of His flesh, <S%G4561><s%> He offered <S%G4374><s%> up both <S%G5037><s%> prayers <S%G1162><s%> and supplications <S%G2428><s%> with loud <S%G2478><s%> crying <S%G2906><s%> and tears <S%G1144><s%> to the One able <S%G1410><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> Him from death, <S%G2288><s%> and He was heard <S%G1522><s%> because <S%G575><s%> of His piety. <S%G2124><s%>
Although <S%G2539><s%> He was a Son, <S%G5207><s%> He learned <S%G3129><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> from the things which <S%G3739><s%> He suffered. <S%G3958><s%>

And having been made <S%G5048><s%> perfect, <S%G5048><s%> He became <S%G1096><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who obey <S%G5219><s%> Him the source <S%G159><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> salvation, <S%G4991><s%>
being designated <S%G4316><s%> by God <S%G2316><s%> as a high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchizedek. <S%G3198><s%>

Concerning <S%G4012><s%> him we have much <S%G4183><s%> to say, <S%G3056><s%> and [it is] hard <S%G1421><s%> to explain, <S%G1421><s%> since <S%G1893><s%> you have become <S%G1096><s%> dull <S%G3576><s%> of hearing. <S%G189><s%>

For though <S%G2532><s%> by this <S%G3588><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> you ought <S%G3784><s%> to be teachers, <S%G1320><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> for someone <S%G5100><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> you the elementary <S%G4747><s%> <S%G746><s%> principles <S%G4747><s%> of the oracles <S%G3051><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and you have come <S%G1096><s%> to need <S%G5532><s%> milk <S%G1051><s%> and not solid <S%G4731><s%> food. <S%G5160><s%>

For everyone <S%G3956><s%> who partakes <S%G3348><s%> [only] of milk <S%G1051><s%> is not accustomed <S%G552><s%> to the word <S%G3056><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> for he is a babe. <S%G3516><s%>

But solid <S%G4731><s%> food <S%G5160><s%> is for the mature, <S%G5046><s%> who because <S%G1223><s%> of practice <S%G1838><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> their senses <S%G145><s%> trained <S%G1128><s%> to discern <S%G1253><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> and evil. <S%G2556><s%>
